A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A fantastic movie that\, while flawed in some respects\, consistently moves the story forward with a great narrative that is pertinent to modern political strife and fits with the cyclical nature of Star Wars.  Don't believe the reviews that say that the characters were inconsistent\, those people don't understand character development and larger thematic arcs.  It was great to see that the characters in this film were affected by the events of their lives\, and aren't the cardboard cut-outs that some want them to be.  Finally\, the reviews section here is awash in obvious bots and broken account links because the alt-right has identified (correctly) that the themes of this movie are in opposition to their movement to re-establish fascism in the Western world.  Don't trust the review average as a result.
